basic_node.title: Spatial non-uniformities of pixels
basic_node.description: Fixed differences in material distribution and size of the pixels within the photodiode, determined by deviations in manufacturing.
basic_node.references: [re12, https://www.thorlabs.com/newgrouppage9.cfm?objectgroup_id=10773, Usage of CMOS and CCD imaging array technologies in flash lidar and atmospheric lidar systems: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8777993/ ; https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1070/QEL17329 ; https://www.osapublishing.org/abstract.cfm?URI=oe-25-16-A628] [re12, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0030401818304632] [re13, https://www.thorlabs.com/newgrouppage9.cfm?objectgroup_id=10773, Usage of CMOS and CCD imaging array technologies in flash lidar and atmospheric lidar systems: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8777993/ ; https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1070/QEL17329 ; https://www.osapublishing.org/abstract.cfm?URI=oe-25-16-A628] [re13, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0030401818304632]
